results.definition: a close friend who accompanies his buddies in their activities
a male with the same parents as someone else
examples: my brother still lives with our parents

results.definition: used as a term of address for those male persons engaged in the same movement
a male person who is a fellow member (of a fraternity or religion or other group)
examples: none of his brothers would betray him

results.definition: (Roman Catholic Church) a title given to a monk and used as form of address
